questions.question: Considering the overall rectangular shape and the clearly defined sections within the presented image, what is the dominant geometric form of the nutritional facts label?
Based on the visual characteristics of the text, what is the dominant color scheme used for the printed nutritional information?

Given the visible design elements, what type of organizational structure is predominantly used to organize and present the nutritional information?
Focusing on the text's presentation, what is the primary typeface style used in presenting the data on calories, fat content, and other related nutritional values?
Considering the text's attributes such as font size and spacing, what is the level of visual density in the nutritional information layout?
Observing the arrangement of different sections in the nutritional information label, what is the visual hierarchy established through visual elements like size, weight and placement?
What is the primary method of information communication being used in this nutritional fact label to visually present the data?
Analyzing the visible markings, what is the method used to visually represent the percentage values of different nutrients in relation to daily recommended intake?

From a visual perspective, is there any visual use of imagery or illustrations in addition to the numerical data in the nutrition facts panel?
